channel.title: Comments on: Fall-o-Meter Reset – Sunday, September 16, 2018

item.title: By: Rie T Buzzwlli
item.dc:creator: Rie T Buzzwlli
item.description: I've been so busy this summer, Went to Cincinatti in August and Hershey Park, PA for Linda's book signing. Debbie and I went to Towsen Univercity for Heidi's registration. My sister-in law and her friends visiting me from Japan since 9/15. I'm going to take them to NY on 19th and her friends are going to see Niagara fall and then take the city tour. Be back home on 22nd. They are leaving on 29th. Could you tell Sue "Happy Birthday" XOXOXOXO
item.content:encoded: I’ve been so busy this summer, Went to Cincinatti in August and Hershey Park, PA for Linda’s book signing. Debbie and I went to Towsen Univercity for Heidi’s registration. My sister-in law and her friends visiting me from Japan since 9/15. I’m going to take them to NY on 19th and her friends are going to see Niagara fall and then take the city tour. Be back home on 22nd. They are leaving on 29th. Could you tell Sue “Happy Birthday” XOXOXOXO
